content.question: Use the tangent line approximation to W at time t = 30 to predict the volume of water W(t), in gigaliters, in the reservoir at time t = 32. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

frqParts.text: Use the tangent line approximation to W at time t = 30 to predict the volume of water W(t), in gigaliters, in the reservoir at time t = 32. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

topic.text: 4.6: Approximating Values of a Function Using Local Linearity and Linearization

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
